Description: WTS305: Example 1
INPUT
{
  message: {
  battery: 100,
  humidity: 56.5,
  pressure: 1015.4,
  temperature: 27.2,
  wind_direction: 25.6,
  wind_speed: 40.2
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 100 },
  humidity: { unitId: '%RH', record: 56.5 },
  pressure: { unitId: 'hPa', record: 1015.4 },
  temperature: { unitId: 'Cel', record: 27.2 },
  angle: { unitId: 'deg', record: 25.6, nature: 'wind direction' },
  speed: { unitId: 'km/h', record: 40.2, nature: 'wind' }
}
